item.description: Open to all students who have taken Basic Aura Viewing or for anyone who has had experience viewing Aura's in their own life. Learn more advanced Aura viewing techniques and receive take-home tools to practice with! Discuss colors, their possible meanings and how to use them to better guide your intuition. This class is fun, laid back and interactive with many practicing opportunities. Cost is $20.00 per person

group.name: Abundance, Empowerment and the Law of Attraction

item.name: Advanced Aurs Reading with Lori Otto
